name: NSScreen
desc: An object that describes the attributes of a computerâ€™s monitor or screen.

items.name: main
items.desc: Returns the screen object containing the window with the keyboard focus.

items.name: deepest
items.desc: Returns a screen object representing the screen that can best represent color.

items.name: screens
items.desc: Returns an array of screen objects representing all of the screens available on the system.

items.name: depth
items.desc: The current bit depth and colorspace information of the screen.

items.name: frame
items.desc: The dimensions and location of the screen.

items.name: supportedWindowDepths
items.desc: A zero-terminated array of the window depths supported by the screen.

items.name: deviceDescription
items.desc: The device dictionary for the screen.

items.name: visibleFrame
items.desc: The current location and dimensions of the visible screen.

items.name: colorSpace
items.desc: The color space of the screen.

items.name: canRepresent
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the color space of the screen is capable of representing the specified display gamut.

items.name: screensHaveSeparateSpaces
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether each screen can have its own set of spaces.

items.name: backingAlignedRect
items.desc: Converts a rectangle in global screen coordinates to a pixel aligned rectangle.

items.name: backingScaleFactor
items.desc: The backing store pixel scale factor for the screen.

items.name: convertRectFromBacking
items.desc: Converts the rectangle from the device pixel aligned coordinates system of a screen.

items.name: convertRectToBacking
items.desc: Converts the rectangle to the device pixel aligned coordinates system of a screen.

items.name: maximumPotentialExtendedDynamicRangeColorComponentValue
items.desc: The maximum possible color component value for the screen when it's in extended dynamic range (EDR) mode.

items.name: maximumExtendedDynamicRangeColorComponentValue
items.desc: The current maximum color component value for the screen.

items.name: maximumReferenceExtendedDynamicRangeColorComponentValue
items.desc: The current maximum color component value for reference rendering to the screen.

items.name: colorSpaceDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Posted when the color space of the screen has changed.
